name: TUSKON EU
goal: TUSKON EU is a non-profit, non-political, non-governmental business association. The TUSKON EU works to establish a mutual understanding between the European institutions, Belgian and Turkish private sector and to bring them together to create new synergetic cooperationâ€™s and business opportunities. At the same time, the TUSKON EU aims to provide correct and unbiased information and knowledge about European, Belgian, and Turkish economic, social, political and business affairs. For that, TUSKON EU tries to create its proper communication network with European business organisations, think tanks and EU Institutions.
interests: Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Neighbourhood Policy
EU Trade Policy
EU Energy Policy
European External Action Service
